name: The Summit
description:
You've heard tales about The Summit. How its cold, icy peak has claimed countless lives.

But she left you no other choice. She went there and you and your company must capture her.

You awake after a terrible battle with her. Your company is dead and you are the sole survivor. But she is nowhere to be found... You need to find her and make sure she's dead.


Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Interact/Attack: J or Z

Character Sheet: K or X


The summit is an action game with some survival and RPG elements. You must fight, keep yourself warm and stave off hunger in order to survive.


Code and Art by Joana Almeida

Website | Twitter | E-mail

Music by Tiago Rodrigues
